page.title: 08Home Improvements.
page.content: Due to most of the houses being old in our area people have to spend quite a lot of money repairing them.We decided to study a typical street to see just how many houses in that street had been repaired.As we could not really expect people to let us inside their houses the survey only noted outside improvements.There were 30 houses in the street.These were the results. New roofs-10 New windows-15 New doors-27 New pebble dash-10 All four improvements-2 From this you can see that people have to spend quite a lot of money on their houses so that they can continue to look nice.
